pages.text: All extra-terrestrial vehicles require fuel in order to advance. Fuel, of course, cannot be some primitive substance like wood or coal. Rockets need something a bit more EXPLOSIVE.$(br2)Hence this entry explains where to find resources and how to make rocket fuel.

pages.title: Oil Wells
pages.text: Oil wells are naturally occurring spouts that can be mainly found in the Ocean. There will be a singular spout with multiple sources surrounding it.$(br2)It is recommended that one bring multiple buckets or ample fluid storage to make enough fuel for all intergalactic adventures.

pages.title: Fuel
pages.text: Fuel is the liquid made by processing oil in a refinery. For every bucket of oil put into the refinery, one bucket of fuel is returned.$(br2)It is used to power all rockets and rovers.

pages.title: Fuel Refinery
pages.text: As stated earlier, this machine powered by energy can produce fuel by consuming oil.
